content: SAN FRANCISCO Shares of Yelp Inc  jumped more than 27 percent on Friday  a day after the company announced the sale of its Eat24 business to Grubhub .
name: GrubHub Inc
title: Yelp shares soar with Grubhub sale

content: SAN FRANCISCO Yelp Inc  said on Thursday it would sell its Eat24 business to Grubhub  for $287.5 million in cash  news along with better-than-expected quarterly revenue that drove its  shares up more than 18 percent.
name: GrubHub Inc
title: Yelp to sell Eat24 for $287.5 million  authorizes share repurchase

content: SAN FRANCISCO  Aug 3 Yelp Inc said on Thursday it would sell its Eat24 business to Grubhub for $287.5 million in cash  news along with better-than-expected quarterly revenue that drove its  shares up more than 18 percent.
